articles.title: Stock Market LIVE: Sensex jumps 200 pts, Nifty 50 pts; Auto, FMCG up; IT drags | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Share Market LIVE Updates: Indian stock market is in green with Sensex remaining above 61,500 and Nifty above 18,300 pts. IndusInd Bank, TCS and Infosys lag; Eicher Motors and M&M jump. IT sinks, while FMCG and Auto gain. Asian stocks in general are dragging.
